participant_1.background:
I've learned to forgive myself for the mistakes I've made in the past.
my eyes are brown.
I'd brag about my ability to cook vegan food that even meat-eaters would love.
I just got a new iPhone, but I'm dreading having to pay my monthly bill.
i m an only child.

participant_2.background:
My first purchase was a bike, so I could enjoy the woods on my own terms.
I am not able to afford a house because of my financial situation.
I like to start my day with a cup of coffee in the woods.
i want to be a doctor.
I dress in a way that is fun and reflects my personality.

content.text: Hi! I am trying to figure out what to do today. Do you have any fun plans?
I want to start my day with a cup of coffee in the woods, but my bike is broken.
Oh no! That is too bad. I just got a new iPhone, but I am dreading having to pay my monthly bill.
I love my phone, but I would prefer to have a bike so I can enjoy the woods.
I would love to go for a bike ride in the woods with you!
That sounds great! I just need to get my bike fixed.
I can help you with that! I am good with bikes.
That is so nice of you! I would really appreciate it.
No problem! I'd be happy to help.
Thanks! I will text you the address of my bike shop.
